attributes.action: oppose the opposed demolition of the Pemberton Centre & Splash Leisure Pool, & their replacement of inferior facilities at Manor Park, Rushden, to the detriment of Rushden & Higham Rugby Union Football Club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We oppose the demolition of the Pemberton Centre & Splash Leisure Pool, & their replacement of inferior facilities at Manor Park, Rushden, to the detriment of Rushden & Higham Rugby Union Football Club.

East Northamptonshire District Council along with Rushden Town Council proposes to build inferior leisure facilities, wasting £13 million of taxpayers money & potentially destroying several user groups including R&HRUFC & the Rushden Amateur Theatrical Society.
